tns:patch.keyword: Funding Start Date and End Date Columns
tns:patch.author: Mouhamad

script.lang: CREATE or replace VIEW v_funding_start_date AS select f.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, f.amp_funding_id AS amp_funding_id, f.actual_start_date AS actual_start_date from amp_funding f join amp_activity a ON (f.amp_activity_id = a.amp_activity_id) order by f.amp_activity_id; CREATE or replace VIEW v_funding_end_date AS select f.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, f.amp_funding_id AS amp_funding_id, f.actual_completion_date AS actual_completion_date from amp_funding f join amp_activity a ON (f.amp_activity_id = a.amp_activity_id) order by f.amp_activity_id;
